name: Poisoned Waters
description:
Poisoned Waters is made for the Games For Change 2022 Student challenge competition with the theme sustainable cities.

You take the role of Junior, a young boy returning to his grandfather's village. This village is the victim of rampant pollution and climate change, and Junior's grandfather has tasked him with picking up trash and convincing the locals to sign a petition to lower pollution output from the local factory. Explore the town and help the villagers while learning their stories.

Use the wasd keys to move, move the mouse to rotate the camera, left click to activate your trash puller, and press J to open your menu screen where you can access the journal, backpack, and petition.
